xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 24 April 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: 00:47 <kushalkhandelwal> Morning 00:47 <sdumitriu> For you maybe... 00:47 <sdumitriu> I was just about to leave 00:48 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 00:48 <kushalkhandelwal> Too late 00:48 <sdumitriu> So, what's up? 00:48 <kushalkhandelwal> Just woke up 00:49 <kushalkhandelwal> Would finish application today study a bit for exams 00:49 <kushalkhandelwal> Still some confusion on it 00:49 <kushalkhandelwal> Would clarify them once you are back 00:49 <kushalkhandelwal> You would be the mentor ? 00:49 <sdumitriu> One of them, yes 00:49 <sdumitriu> We think every project should have several mentors 00:50 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh 00:50 <sdumitriu> Marta will probably handle more on the UI part, me on the code part 00:50 <kushalkhandelwal> So should I talk to her also ? 00:50 <kushalkhandelwal> So how many mentors in total ? 00:50 <kushalkhandelwal> You mentoring at Xwiki also ? 00:50 <sdumitriu> Yes 00:51 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice :) 00:51 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes for talking to marta or mentoring ? :P 00:51 <sdumitriu> Yes for Mentoring at XWiki 00:52 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice :) 00:52 <ravigarg27> has quit 00:52 <kushalkhandelwal> Should I talk to her also about the project once 00:52 <sdumitriu> Yes 00:53 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok 00:53 <kushalkhandelwal> would do that in the evening when you are back 00:53 <kushalkhandelwal> BTW who is the organization administrator for GSOC ? 00:54 <kushalkhandelwal> Michael Brudno ? 00:54 <sdumitriu> Yes, as the head of the CCM, but Marta is the actual admin 00:55 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh so marta is head for GSOC 00:57 <kushalkhandelwal> So much of work these days ? You working late nights also 00:57 <kushalkhandelwal> Anyways how is the weather in toronto ? Burning hot in India :\ 00:58 <sdumitriu> Cold, but getting warmer 00:59 <sdumitriu> Trees just started showing fresh new leaves 00:59 <sdumitriu> They'll probably bloom in a few days 01:01 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh Great 01:01 <kushalkhandelwal> Have you ever been to India ? 01:01 <sdumitriu> Nope 01:03 <kushalkhandelwal> Hm 01:09 <froggy> has quit 01:09 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 01:11 <sdumitriu> You're not following the commit message pattern 01:12 <sdumitriu> ----- 01:12 <sdumitriu> ----- 01:12 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh Ok .. Fixed in the end 01:13 <sdumitriu> But anyway, good job 01:16 <kushalkhandelwal> thanks 01:54 <kushalkhandelwal> How come you awake ? 02:31 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 02:40 <sdumitriu> has quit 02:46
